requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i3-9100F
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5-9400kf
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
